mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO goal_history ( goal_id, member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, click_per_progress, is_completed, record_date ) SELECT g.id, g.member_id, g.goal_type, g.title, g.target_value, g.progress_value, g.click_per_progress, CASE WHEN g.progress_value >= g.target_value THEN true ELSE false END, #{recordDate} FROM goal g WHERE g.goal_type = 'DAILY' AND (g.end_date IS NULL OR g.end_date >= #{recordDate})

INSERT IGNORE INTO goal_history ( goal_id, member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, click_per_progress, is_completed, record_date ) SELECT g.id, g.member_id, g.goal_type, g.title, g.target_value, g.progress_value, g.click_per_progress, CASE WHEN g.progress_value >= g.target_value THEN true ELSE false END, #{recordDate} FROM goal g WHERE g.goal_type = 'WEEKLY' AND (g.end_date IS NULL OR g.end_date >= #{recordDate})

INSERT IGNORE INTO goal_history ( goal_id, member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, click_per_progress, is_completed, record_date ) SELECT g.id, g.member_id, g.goal_type, g.title, g.target_value, g.progress_value, g.click_per_progress, CASE WHEN g.progress_value >= g.target_value THEN true ELSE false END, #{recordDate} FROM goal g WHERE g.id = #{goalId} AND g.goal_type = 'WEEKLY'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goal_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND ( (goal_type = 'DAILY' AND record_date = #{date}) OR (goal_type = 'WEEKLY' AND record_date = DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(#{date})) DAY)) ) ORDER BY is_completed ASC, created_at DESC

SELECT * FROM goal_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND ( (goal_type = 'DAILY' AND record_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (goal_type = 'WEEKLY' AND record_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{startDate}, INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND #{endDate}) )
